p:
However, focusing solely on average performance ignores elements of the response of epidemic impact (κ
E ) to the cull radius ( L) that may be of practical significance. The distributions shown in the inset to Fig 2 for a selection of radii ( L = 50m, 75m, 100m, 150m, 200m and 400m) allow the following pair of provisos to this naïve optimum to be identified.
